name: Solitaire Marathon
description:
Solitaire Marathon is a competitive game that you can play online in real time against your friends or other players from all around the World!

How To be Champion?
Tournament starts with 4 players. In each game you will have to solve the same solitaire game as your opponent. One player will be knocked out in each round. The first one to solve third round will win the tournament. Knock Out your opponents one by one and be the Solitaire champion!

Game Rules
The rules of the game are the same Klondike rules that you already know.

Game Controls
Move Card: Click on a card to send it to appropriate place. You can also Drag & Drop card.
Hint: Help you to play faster.
Undo: Correct your mistakes.
Magnet: Automatically send cards to foundation.
Magic: Use magic if you are stuck, It will get you best hidden card and will clear your way to victory!

Game Attraction
Design: Easy and refreshing interface.
Realtime Multiplayer: Don't play with robots in other games. Play real time only with real users from all around the world!
Speed: Works smoothly on slow Internet connection.
Daily Rewards: Get daily FREE MAGICS which helps you to win the game.
Weekly Competition: Participate in weekly tournament and complete with peoples from all around the world!
Leaderboard: Play your way to top the Leaderboards!

Game Features
Tournament: Compete against 4 opponents and show your Klondike skills to them.
Head To Head: Challenge your friends or global users.
Tic Tac Toe: Don't be bored in waiting for your opponents. Play Tic Tac Toe while you are waiting for your other opponents.
Chat: In game chat to communicate with opponents.
Request: Send in game invitation to your friends and play with your Friends!

COME JOIN AND ENJOY!

Any suggestions? We always love to hear from you and making this App better. Contact us on info@gamewithpals.com.
